title: Core System (dependency module)
subtitle: Spring Boot (Java) | Maven Repository
text: A Core-System in Microkernel/Plugin Architecture Pattern to configure: Thread Pool capacity, RBAC Security (ROLE-URI), AOP logger pattern & file size, REST Client-Service, Email Service for Spring Boot apps

title: VideoQuotes
subtitle: Spring Boot (Java) | Vue.js | Webpack | Node.js | MongoDB | Nginx on Docker | GitHub Actions
text:
Spring Boot (w/ JWT auth) backend, a Vue.js on frontend Nginx server and a mongoDB as database.
 The motivation behind that 7 year old personal experiment was to make a tool to help in taking notes and make "video-quotes" out of Youtube interviews I casually check. My Heroku deployment is retired; but you can always run it free in your local machine for fun

title: Face verification
subtitle: TensorFlow/Keras (Python) | FFmpeg
text: Fine-tuned VGG16 model to verify certain person out of YouTube video (used VideoQuotes as a training dataset)

title: H5Recorder
subtitle: Node.js | FFmpeg | NPM | Phantom.js
text:
NPM package that records web pages and generates video reports; 
 Parameters are passed as query-string (?queryK=V) to template webpage(s), in which it get merged with video/audio resources based on color/chroma keys (Green Screen) using FFmpeg

title: MIU Team project: Facial Expression Recognition model
subtitle: Python | TensorFlow/Keras
text: A Transfer Learning team project for the MIU Machine Learning course. I did the Grad-Cam implementation part (last part)

title: MIU Team project: Movie Recommendation System
subtitle: Python | PyTorch | TensorFlow/Keras
text: A Collaborative Filtering team project for the MIU Machine Learning course. I did the AutoML and CollabFNet implementation part (last part)

title: My UI Pool
subtitle: TypeScript | React.js | Bootstrap | Anime.css | Nginx on Docker | GitHub Actions
text: NPM dependency module to provide a pool of reusable UI components to resolve boilerplate stuff; e.g: cards & header of this page
